title: Modern Wheels or Classic Steals
overview: Modern Wheels or Classic Steals pitches presenters Rebecca Jackson and Elo against each other, as they try to convince one car buyer to agree to purchase one of their personally selected vehicles.With a background in selling, and racing, modern cars, Rebecca is perfectly placed to source and supply some fantastic modern wheels. And, with a huge collection of classic cars and as the self-proclaimed king of cool, Elo knows all there is when it comes to finding the right classic steal for our contributor's needs. But with a list of varying demands each week, whose cars will the buyer choose to drive away in?
